casebody.data:
Michael F. EVERS, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
The ZONING BOARD OF the CITY OF HOBOKEN and 136 Park Avenue, LP, Defendants-Respondents. C-807 September Term 2017
080653 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003915-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
